message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I understand its value might be high to you, but given my budget, I am only able to offer $100 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counter with an offer of $140 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $165, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, I can't exceed $150 for the product. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
